name: Igglybuff
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: Its extremely flexible and elastic body makes it bounce continuously—anytime, anywhere.

attacks.name: Good Night Song
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

rule_box: If this Baby Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and your opponent announces an attack, your opponent flips a coin (before doing anything else). If tails, your opponent’s turn ends.
